history.proof: intros d a t. split. - intros H. inversion H as [d' a' t' ladj H1 H2]. srun best use: dt_kill_empty_d. - intros H. inversion H as [d' a' t' ladj H1 H2]. srun best use: dt_kill_empty_r.

ctx: inversion H as [d' a' t' ladj H1 H2].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: inversion H as [d' a' t' ladj H1 H2].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: inversion H as [d' a' t' ladj H1 H2].
inversion H as [d' a' t' ladj H1 H2].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros d a t. split. - intros H. inversion H as [d' a' t' ladj H1 H2]. apply rec_dta with (ladj:=ladj). + apply H1. + apply H2. - intros H. inversion H as [d' a' t' ladj H1 H2]. apply rec_dta with (ladj:=ladj). + apply H1. + apply H2.
